name: Quest - Figma to React Components, HTML pages
description:
The better way to build your front end. Convert your Figma designs to React components automatically. Pixel-perfect to your design, responsive across screen sizes. Export clean, efficient code that is extendable with your custom code or business logic. Try it risk free. 


Key Features:

  • Easy to use - see your design come to life in the form of React code just by exporting to Quest. Iterate easily by looking at the end product - no more guesswork.
  • Works with Figma features like variants, autolayout, etc.
  • Use the built-in design system or bring your own.
  • Supports Material UI Component library by default. Or you can build your own or bring in your own (Contact us if youâ€™d like to import your existing UI component library).
  • Set up props, bindings and state triggers easily without writing any code.
  • Export clean React code that is as good as hand-coded by a developer.
  • Separation of concerns between the presentation layer and the business logic - iterate on your design as often as you want and generate the presentation layer without any development effort.


Risk-free - build one component and add it to your existing react app. Build more as you go - no need to throw away what you already have and start over.


To get started:

  • Install this plugin
  • Login to your Quest account
  • Follow our Quick Start list to build your first component: https://docs.quest.ai/getting-started/quick-start


Learn more at https://quest.ai/
